name: Dare Enter My Dungeon
description:
We've saved the princess hundreds of times. We killed the evil Vizier
a thousand times and brought gigantic beasts  to their knees. BUT THIS
TIME! You get to be the bad guy! Kill the peasants that entered your
Dungeon. Secure your reign and show them what true supremacy looks like.
But.. you need to think strategically. Do not rush, do not lose.  


Instructions

The white box indicates the movement range of each character. 

You can move 3 blocks towards any direction.

You can see your enemies info on the right side of the screen.

Use your wits to annihilate them! (and your mouse to play!)

Features
  • Original Art 
  • Original Music
  • The Pleasure of Playing as a Ruthless Beast 
  • The Need for Smart Decisions
Credits
  • Concept: DEMBERG
  • Programming: Giorgos Pagalis
  • Art/Animation: Rea Papadopetrou 
  • Sound Design/Music: Denia Palaiologou
